mapper.insert: INSERT INTO replies(reply_no, board_no, reply_content, user_no) VALUES (replies_seq.NEXTVAL, #{boardNo}, #{replyContent}, #{userNo})
mapper.update: UPDATE replies SET reply_content=#{replyContent}, updateDate= SYSDATE WHERE reply_no=#{replyNo}
mapper.select: select count(replyNo) from replies where boardNo = #{boardNo}
